name: A pre-fabricated home in a shipping container
description: Who says you have to pay exorbitant broker fees to find the home of your dreams? You can make your dreams of homeownership come true as easily as you'd buy a bottle of dish soap, thanks to this storage-container-turned-house, available for a cool $36K. And before you sign off on a mortgage

name: 1,500 live ladybugs
description: Who says you can't buy anything for under $10 anymore? In fact, Amazon shoppers can buy 1,500 crawling, flying somethings for the bargain price of a latte

name: Uranium ore
description: While this small amount of uranium ore is pretty low on the radioactivity meter, it's pretty weird that you can buy it from the same site where you get your gym socks

name: A home mushroom farm
description: Now you can grow your own fungus right at homeâ€”and not in between your toes

name: A cat butt tissue holder
description: This seems like the nicest thing to be plucked from a cat's rear since, well, ever. And who doesn't like to be stared down with peering, inquisitive eyes each time they need to blow their nose?
